name: GMTK JAM 2020 - WHEEL TURRET
description:
Game makers tool kit 48 hour game jam

The theme was out of control, so my game is about a turret on wheels that continuously fires. The player must guide the turret by rotating it and using the force from its shots to get past the obstacles.

There are 4 levels in total

This was created by myself, music was not made by me

Controls - 

Q / E or Arrow keys - rotate

Space - change fire
